refnamediv.refpurpose: function y = interp(x, q, n, Wc)

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: y = interp(x, q) y = interp(x, q, n) y = interp(x, q, n, Wc)

listitem.para: scalar or vector of complex or real numbers
non decreasing vector or scalar, starting from 0 uptill 1, default value 0.5

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This is an Octave function. This function upsamples the signal x by a factor of q, using an order 2*q*n+1 FIR filter. The second argument q must be an integer. The default values of the third and fourth arguments (n, Wc) are 4 and 0.5 respectively.
